conbody.p: This is another tab specific for an object.
Choose the location of your object from the Thesaurus.
Enter the number of your object if provided.
Enter a comment about the location of the object if necessary.
Select this check box if the object is still preserved in its original location.
Select this check box if the present location differs from its original location (e.g. on display or in inventory of a museum).
Click to add an additional "location" section so you can enter a previous location (if it differs from the present location).
